MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH61 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Gills Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:40PM. Our engineers are on site and have confirmed there is a fault on the underground cable network.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, we now expect the power to be restored by 11PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:10PM on 29th March 2021
